name: Trivia Trials
description:
BE RESILIENT AND KEEP GOING!

It's about Trial and Error. Show your resilience by passing all 20 random Questions and Riddles before your Time runs out, or admit to your weakness and surrender. It's your choice. Do you have what it takes?

WATCH THE STOPWATCH!

How long will you take to beat the game? How long you take will be recorded. You can slack off and take your time if you want to, or you can rush trough the trials and speerun it. The choice is yours. Either way, the Stopwatch is counting.



*This game contains mature content, such as implied nudity
